summary: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 31578, entitled: "An ordinance constituting the building code of the City of Seattle, relating to and regulating the construction, alteration, repair, use and occupation of buildings and structures, providing penalties for violation and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith", approved July 22, 1913, by adding thereto a new section to be known as Section 930.
